places.name: President Kennedy Square (Rodrigo's Square)
places.address: R. Expedicionários, 1297-1397 - Jardim Bela Vista, Cosmópolis - SP, 13150-000
places.description: A plaza with green areas, playgrounds, and a monuments to famous people.

places.name: Iron Bridge
places.description: A historic iron bridge over the Atibaia River, offering scenic views and a glimpse into the city's past.

places.name: Paulínia Ecological Park
places.address: Av. Pres. Getúlio Vargas, s/nº - Centro, Paulínia - SP, 13140-000
places.description: A large park with walking trails, picnic areas, and a lake, perfect for outdoor activities and relaxation.

places.name: Luís Perissinotto Municipal Stadium
places.address: R. Prudente Pigatto, S/N - Santa Cecilia, Paulínia - SP, 13140-000
places.description: Sports stadium hosting local football matches and events.

places.name: Paulínia Municipal Theater
places.address: Av. José Lozano Araújo, 1551 - Parque Brasil 500, Paulínia - SP, 13140-000
places.description: A cultural venue offering a variety of performances, including theater, music, and dance.

places.name: Birds' Lagoon Park
places.address: R. Tiradentes - Centro, Artur Nogueira - SP, 13160-000
places.description: A serene park with a lagoon, walking paths, and birdwatching opportunities.

places.name: Dodge Museum
places.description: A museum showcasing vintage Dodge cars and automotive history.

places.name: Green Camp - Leisure and Fishing Center
places.address: Rod. Vicinal Santa Rosa, km 5, s/n Vicinal Rua Limeira Chácaras Campos dos Amarais, Artur Nogueira - SP, 13160-000
places.description: A recreational area offering fishing, picnicking, and outdoor activities.
